subject: Hi My Love
body:
Hi My Love
It is regrettable based on previous lost, money spent and other
inconveniences. I want you at this point to forget all lost in the past
and receive this fund for your best living. I guaranteed a successful
cash payment delivery worth $5.5m to your address without stoppage by
any authority. I want you to receive this fund so as to meet all
economic challenges. I guaranteed a successful delivery to your
address without stoppage by any authority.
Therefore you are to obtain Customs Clearance Bond which will be
attached, to confirm that the consignment has been duly checked and
cleared against financial crime and as such is not subject to further
inspection by the Customs in your state before delivery to your
address. It will cost you $2,011 to obtain Customs Clearance Bond .
In God We Trust
Miss Joy Eke

subject: Re:    Hi My Love
body:
Dear Miss Joy Eke,

Thank you for your message. I understand that you are suggesting a cash payment delivery to my address. However, I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed.

Firstly, could you please provide more details about the source of this fund? It's important for me to know where the money is coming from for legal and ethical reasons.

Secondly, could you explain what the Customs Clearance Bond is and why it's necessary? Also, how much will it cost me to obtain this bond?

Lastly, I would appreciate if you could provide some form of identification or proof that this transaction is legitimate. 

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Leona
